food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys like me a lot! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A furry animal really likes this fruit!
💛 I am the color of sunshine!
🌱 I grow on a tree!

food.question: I am round and red (or green!) and grow on trees. Doctors say I keep them away! What am I?

hints.text: 🥧 You can make a yummy pie with me!
🌳 I hang from branches in an orchard.
❤️ I am sometimes called a 'fruit of knowledge'.

food.question: I am long and orange and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable!
👀 Eating me helps you see better!
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I help you grow big and strong!
🐄 I come from an animal on a farm.
🥣 I taste good with cookies.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. You might not like to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable!
🟢 I am the same color as grass.
🍲 Some people eat me in soup.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I can be sliced and toasted. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make a sandwich with me!
🌾 I am often made from wheat.
🔥 I can be crispy if you put me in a toaster.

food.question: I am a frozen treat that comes in many flavors. I am eaten with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold!
🍦 I am often served in a cone.
🍫 Chocolate is a popular flavor of me.

food.question: I am a sauce made from tomatoes, and I'm often put on pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I make a good combination with noodles.
🍅 I am a reddish color and come from a vegetable.
🌿 You can add herbs to me to make me extra tasty.

food.question: I am made of corn and pop when heated. You eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I smell delicious when I'm being made.
🌽 I start as small kernels.
🎬 People like to eat me while watching movies.

food.question: I am a sweet treat with layers of different flavors, often eaten for birthdays. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 People sing "Happy Birthday" when I'm around.
🍰 I am often covered in frosting and decorations.
🕯️ You put candles on me and blow them out.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a yummy treat for some animals.
🌱 I grow under the dirt.
🥬 I am a type of vegetable.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I can be many colors.
👃 I have a nice smell.
💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am tall and have leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very big.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and thin and grow on a vine. I am green and sometimes have bumpy skin. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 People slice me up for salads.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.
🌿 I grow on a crawling plant.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I have liquid inside.
🏝️ You might find me on a tropical island.
🌴 I grow on palm trees.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a vine. I am juicy and good in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am often used to make sauce.
☀️ I need lots of sun to grow.
🪴 I am a fruit that people think is a vegetable.

plant.question: I have sharp needles and stay green all year. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I am a type of evergreen.
🎁 People put presents under me.
🌟 You can hang ornaments on me.

plant.question: I have a big, round head and yellow petals all around. I follow the sun during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 My name tells you what I look like.
☀️ I love to soak up the rays!
🌾 Farmers sometimes grow me for my seeds.

plant.question: I am a plant that is very old and wise. I grow rings inside to tell you how long I have lived. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 You can make paper from me.
🦉 Many animals live in me.
🌲 If you cut me down, you can count the rings.

plant.question: I am a green plant with thorns that can hurt. I have beautiful flowers that smell lovely. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often a symbol of love.
🥀 I have thorns that protect me.
🌸 I come in many colors and have a beautiful smell.
